attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Incarcerated in Rathmines, Dublin since November 2006 for a crime he has yet to commit, Paul "Docs" Doherty needs your support to secure his release for Munich 2007.  With only 6 months to go, the campaign to "Free The Rathmines One" needs your urgent help!

Putting the "Doc" back into 'toberfest!' This campaign for justice is in reaction to the struggle of one man and his continuing battle to enjoy a good time at Das Oktoberfest 2007. Although not an easy conquest we, the administrators of "Docspace", have taken a pledge of allegiance to stand 'shoulder to shoulder' with Paul (aka P.Doccles) in a bid to salvage his Oktoberfest 2007 aspirations. We do this not only for Paul Doherty, but also for what he has now come to represent, we do this for all the other P. Doccles out there, each fighting to have their own fun at their own "beer festival." This is because within each and everyone of us is a little P. Doccles who is trying desperately to get out, but has been told he is "not allowed to."

www.myspace.com/doctoberfest

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
